title: Libreboot Open-Source Firmware Now Supports HP EliteBook 820 G2 Laptops
description:
The Libreboot open-source and free BIOS/UEFI replacement firmware is now available for the HP EliteBook 820 G2 laptop.

The post Libreboot Open-Source Firmware Now Supports HP EliteBook 820 G2 Laptops appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: PipeWire Camera Support Is Coming to OBS Studio for Linux Desktops
description:
PipeWire Camera support is coming to the OBS Studio open-source screencasting and streaming app for Linux desktops. Here's what to expect!

The post PipeWire Camera Support Is Coming to OBS Studio for Linux Desktops appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
